data.eml:eml: Two new species of Oncerotrachelus Stål (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Saicinae), from Amazonas, Brazil, with taxonomical notes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gil-Santana, Hélcio R. (2013): Two new species of Oncerotrachelus Stål (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Saicinae), from Amazonas, Brazil, with taxonomical notes. Zootaxa 3626 (2): 268-278, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.2.4
